summary: BFPP is a multiplex PCR panel that identifies 33 common bacterial and viral pathogens seen in community- and hospital-acquired pneumonias. it rapidly identifies these pathogens in addition to 7 antibiotic resistance genes on sputum and bronchioalveolar lavage samples in 1 hour. results 43 tests were ordered in total. BFPP is a powerful tool for antibiotic stewardship that results in rapid interventions to achieve optimal targeted therapy.
